events.title: Soup 'n Story Gala
events.description: Kick-Off supper and storytelling. $25/person; $45/couple - Limited Seating - Ticket Required

events.title: On-Site Registration and Information
events.description: Tickets, Registration &  Information available for pick-up or purchase.

events.title: Lunch and Laugh
events.description: Lunch and story with 45 minute performance by Tim Tingle. Pre-registration required. Call 864-476-8770. $12/person. For groups of 6 or more $10/person. Ticket Required.

events.title: Stone Soup Market
events.description: Books, Teller CDs and  Souvenirs available for purchase.

events.title: Friday Night Special
events.description: Live storytelling with Karyn Page Davies as Emcee. Free Admission!

events.title: Stone Soup Supper
events.description: Enjoy dinner in an engaging atmosphere with personal contact with storytellers. Suggested donation $5.

events.title: Ghost Stories a la Stone Soup
events.description: Live storytelling with Karyn Page Davies as Emcee. Recommended for children 12 years and up. Free Admission!

events.title: Storytelling Registation and Info
events.description: Tickets, Registration and information available for pick-up or purchase.

events.title: Stone Soup Market
events.description: Books, Teller Cds, Sourvenirs available for purchase.

events.title: Back to the Future
events.description: Abigail Adams and Old Bess in person. Free Admission!

events.title: What will you learn today? Children's Stories
events.description: Engaging stories for children ages 5-12. Free Admission!

events.title: New Voices I
events.description: Hear some fresh new storytellers with some great tales to tell. Emcee - Linda Goodman. Free Admission!

events.title: 'My Tale' Story Competition
events.description: Emcee - Cora Newcomb. Open competition for Amateurs. Both Youth and Adults will compete for prizes. Sign up. 7 minute limit. Free Admission!

events.title: New Voices II
events.description: Emcee - Linda Goodman. Round two of fresh new storytellers with some great tales to tell. Free Admission!

events.title: Liar's Contest
events.description: Emcee - Rodger Ellingwood. Yes, a new champion liar will be crowned. You don't want to miss this. $5 entry fee. Free Admission!

events.title: Carolina New Voices
events.description: Emcee - Suzette Hawkins, President SCSN. Come hear fresh new voices from South Carolina. Free Admission!

events.title: 'Tell It All' The Grand Finale
events.description: The Grand Daddy of Storytelling at the Stone Soup Festival. All the featured storytellers will be strutting their stuff. Winners of 'Biggest Liar' and 'My Tales' competitions will also be presenting. Snacks available. $8/person or $20/family (2 adults and children under 16).
storytellers: Winners of 'Biggest Liar' and 'My Tale' Competitions

events.title: Time Well Spent - After Party
events.description: Time to kick back and enjoy the great spirit of storytelling by swapping tales with new friends over refreshments.

events.title: Stories of Grace
events.description: Worship with a 20-30 minute story sharing time by Tim Tingle. All are welcome. Free Admission!

tellers.name: Tim Tingle
tellers.bio: Tim is an enrolled member of the Choctaw Nation...
